message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher than that for me.  Could you do $150?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really can't go above $120. Can you meet me at that price?
